questions.question: What is the purpose of an RC phase shift oscillator?

answers.a: To generate a square wave output signal
answers.b: To generate a sine wave output signal
answers.d: To filter out high-frequency components from an input signal

questions.question: How many RC sections are required for a basic RC phase shift oscillator?
What is the phase shift created by each RC section in an RC phase shift oscillator?
What is the total phase shift provided by the RC network in an RC phase shift oscillator ?
What is the frequency of oscillation of an RC phase shift oscillator

answers.a: Directly proportional to the resistance of each resistor
answers.b: Directly proportional to the capacitance of each capacitor
answers.c: Inversely proportional to the resistance of each resistor
answers.d: Inversely proportional to the capacitance of each capacitor
